main event: A witness observed a bright circular object emitting a white light near Pine Ridge, South Dakota, on May 6, 1969.
interesting points: The observer initially thought the object might be an aircraft but concluded it was not,The object hovered in one spot for about 5 minutes before shooting straight up into the sky,The observer was a 42-year-old male with prior experience sighting UFOs, Another sighting was reported around the same time, involving a light moving at high speed, The object was described as being about the size of a 16-foot trailer.
sighted object: a circular object emitting a bright white light
witness description: a 42-year-old male who has sighted UFOs before
